Teriyaki Chicken: One 2-inch (5cm) piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated
2-pounds (900g) boneless chicken thighs (4-8 thighs, depending on size)
Chicken Vesuvio: 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
1 3-4 pound chicken, cut into 8 pieces (or 3 pound chicken legs)
Chicken Teriyaki: 4 pieces chicken, trimmed, skin pierced with a fork
Chicken Piccata: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, patted dry (2 1/2 to 3 pounds total)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Baked Chicken: 6 bone-in chicken breast halves, or 6 chicken thighs and wings, skin-on
Catalan Chicken: 3 lemons, peeled, rinds thinly sliced and reserved
½ cup Banyuls or another fortified dessert wine
